directions: Spread mustard onto the cut sides of the bagel. Layer the lettuce, green pepper, cucumber, and tomato on one half. Season the tomato with salt and pepper. Top with onion and alfalfa sprouts, then cover with the other half of the bagel.
ingredients: 2 (1/4 inch thick) rings green bell pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Fresh Veggie Bagel Sandwich
